alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued February 02 at 9:44PM PST until February 03 at 9:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST THURSDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures in the lower to mid 30s, east of a San Bernardino to Lake Elsinore line, will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until noon PST Thursday. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
